column2: "The secret to the Gilnas's toughness is its hidden core! That tricky jerk!"
"But really, how did you defeat that fluffy and annoying Gilnas Core?"
"It's so small, I don't have the patience to try hitting that thing. I mean, talk about a pain in the ass!"
"Anyway, I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Make it happen!"
